Serialized Form

  • Package a2

    • Class a2.CanvasPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • colour

          java.awt.Color colour
          RGB pen colour set with colour chooser.

        • endPoint

          java.awt.Point endPoint
          end Point of drawn shape set when mouse released.

        • fill

          java.awt.Color fill
          RGB fill colour set with colour chooser.

        • h

          double h
          the height of the panel set on resize.

        • list

          java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> list
          an arrayList of Points added to when clicking to draw polygon

        • listOfDrawableShapes

          java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList> listOfDrawableShapes
          the arrayList of Lists of shapes with co-ordinates in panel Point format, created before painting from ListOfShapes dependant on canvas dimensions stored on resize.

        • listOfShapes

          java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList> listOfShapes
          the arrayList of Lists of shapes with co-ordinates in VEC format, added to when shape is added (drawn).

        • pointEnd

          java.awt.Point pointEnd
          the end Point set as mouse is dragged and moved, used to continuously draw line.

        • pointStart

          java.awt.Point pointStart
          the start Point set on mouse press used to continuously draw line when clicking and dragging.

        • startPoint

          java.awt.Point startPoint
          start Point of drawn shape set when mouse pressed or clicked.

        • tool

          Draw tool
          instance of Draw set when toolButton selected.

        • w

          double w
          the width of the panel set on resize.

    • Class a2.GUI extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • canvas

          CanvasPanel canvas
          The CanvasPanel that drawing is handled on.

        • mainPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel mainPanel
          The main JPanel that contains the toolPanel and canvas.

        • toolLabel

          javax.swing.JLabel toolLabel
          JLabel included in toolPanel that is changed depending on selected tool.
